name: Guidus
description:
Once upon a time, the brave hero went with his colleagues to defeat the Demon King. However, the Demon King's power was so strong that he was eventually defeated.

"You are too weak to defeat me. Train from the bottom up and challenge me!"

After a long time, you wake up in an unfamiliar place, losing your memory.
Gather scattered colleagues and escape to the ground!
--------------------------------------------------------
◈ The power of numerous temples
Defeat your enemies with the power of over 100 temples.

◈ Various characters
Use various characters such as knights, archers, and wizards.

◈ Unique skills
Each character has its own skills. Use your skills to defeat your enemies.

◈ Various bosses and monsters
Fight against various monsters and powerful bosses that block you.

◈ Dangerous traps
Break through dungeons avoiding dangerous traps.

◈ Mobile action roguelike rpg
Continue to challenge and grow. It will get stronger and stronger.

◈ Nostalgic pixel graphics
Immerse yourself in cute and awesome pixel graphics

◈ Inquiry
